name: Hellephant Run
description:
Game developed for a class assignment using a limited group of assets.

Avoid obstacles and collect clocks to get the highest score.

Sounds used:
https://freesound.org/people/Mativve/sounds/391538/
https://freesound.org/people/EminYILDIRIM/sounds/536108/
https://freesound.org/people/ConBlast/sounds/562974/
